summary: REQ-2 appears implemented via service worker cache versioning and precaching of the specified branding assets. REQ-1 (actual regenerated PNG branding assets and favicon/manifest references) and REQ-3 (production rebuild/redeploy producing a working icp0.io URL) are not evidenced in the diff. The backend received substantial new functionality unrelated to the branding/redeploy request, suggesting hallucinated scope.

missing_requirements.reason: No deployment configuration, canister identifiers, or build/redeploy artifacts/changes are shown in the diff that would produce a new working production URL.
evidence: project_state.json (still indicates the request is pending/in_progress; no produced URL or deployment change evidenced)
Diff summary overall (no deployment-related files shown)

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals disallow unrelated data model/CRUD changes; the request focuses on branding assets, service worker cache bump, and redeploy to fix the canister link.
